SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT T2.FUEL_KND ,T2.CAR_REGIST_NO ,T2.CAR_NM ,SUM(NVL(MIN(T1.MTOTAL),0)) OVER (PARTITION BY T2.FUEL_KND) AS TOTAL ,NVL(MIN(T1.MTOTAL),0) AS MTOTAL ,MIN(T1.M1) AS M1 ,MIN(T1.M2) AS M2 ,MIN(T1.M3) AS M3 ,MIN(T1.M4) AS M4 ,MIN(T1.M5) AS M5 ,MIN(T1.M6) AS M6 ,MIN(T1.M7) AS M7 ,MIN(T1.M8) AS M8 ,MIN(T1.M9) AS M9 ,MIN(T1.M10) AS M10 ,MIN(T1.M11) AS M11 ,MIN(T1.M12) AS M12 FROM CAR_INFO_F T2 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT T.CAR_REGIST_NO ,SUM(T.REFUEL_QY) AS MTOTAL ,SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTRB(T.REFUEL_MT,5,2)='01' THEN T.REFUEL_QY END) AS M1 ,SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTRB(T.REFUEL_MT,5,2)='02' THEN T.REFUEL_QY END) AS M2 ,SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTRB(T.REFUEL_MT,5,2)='03' THEN T.REFUEL_QY END) AS M3 ,SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTRB(T.REFUEL_MT,5,2)='04' THEN T.REFUEL_QY END) AS M4 ,SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTRB(T.REFUEL_MT,5,2)='05' THEN T.REFUEL_QY END) AS M5 ,SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTRB(T.REFUEL_MT,5,2)='06' THEN T.REFUEL_QY END) AS M6 ,SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTRB(T.REFUEL_MT,5,2)='07' THEN T.REFUEL_QY END) AS M7 ,SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTRB(T.REFUEL_MT,5,2)='08' THEN T.REFUEL_QY END) AS M8 ,SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTRB(T.REFUEL_MT,5,2)='09' THEN T.REFUEL_QY END) AS M9 ,SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTRB(T.REFUEL_MT,5,2)='10' THEN T.REFUEL_QY END) AS M10 ,SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTRB(T.REFUEL_MT,5,2)='11' THEN T.REFUEL_QY END) AS M11 ,SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTRB(T.REFUEL_MT,5,2)='12' THEN T.REFUEL_QY END) AS M12 FROM CAR_REFUEL_STTUS_F T
WHERE T.REFUEL_MT>= #sRefuelMt# || '01' AND T.REFUEL_MT<= #sRefuelMt# || '12'
AND T.CAR_REGIST_NO LIKE '%' || #sCarRegistNo# || '%'
GROUP BY T.CAR_REGIST_NO ) T1 ON (T2.CAR_REGIST_NO=T1.CAR_REGIST_NO) WHERE T2.FUEL_KND IN (#sFuelKnd1#, #sFuelKnd2#, #sFuelKnd3#, #sFuelKnd4#, #sFuelKnd5#, #sFuelKnd6#) GROUP BY T2.FUEL_KND,T2.CAR_REGIST_NO,T2.CAR_NM ORDER BY T2.FUEL_KND DESC,T2.CAR_REGIST_NO ) S ) A
WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM CAR_INFO_F T WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 'Y' FROM CAR_REFUEL_STTUS_F
WHERE REFUEL_MT>= #sRefuelMt# || '01' AND REFUEL_MT<= #sRefuelMt# || '12'
AND CAR_REGIST_NO LIKE '%' || #sCarRegistNo# || '%'
) AND T.FUEL_KND IN (#sFuelKnd1#, #sFuelKnd2#, #sFuelKnd3#, #sFuelKnd4#, #sFuelKnd5#, #sFuelKnd6#)
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO CAR_REFUEL_STTUS_F ( CAR_REGIST_NO ,REFUEL_MT ,REFUEL_QY ,REG_USR ,REGIST_DT ,UPD_USR ,UPDT_DT ) SELECT #carRegistNo# AS CAR_REGIST_NO ,#refuelMt# || LTRIM(TO_CHAR(LEVEL,'00')) AS REFUEL_MT ,(CASE WHEN LEVEL=1 THEN NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#m1#,',','')),0) WHEN LEVEL=2 THEN NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#m2#,',','')),0) WHEN LEVEL=3 THEN NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#m3#,',','')),0) WHEN LEVEL=4 THEN NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#m4#,',','')),0) WHEN LEVEL=5 THEN NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#m5#,',','')),0) WHEN LEVEL=6 THEN NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#m6#,',','')),0) WHEN LEVEL=7 THEN NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#m7#,',','')),0) WHEN LEVEL=8 THEN NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#m8#,',','')),0) WHEN LEVEL=9 THEN NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#m9#,',','')),0) WHEN LEVEL=10 THEN NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#m10#,',','')),0) WHEN LEVEL=11 THEN NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#m11#,',','')),0) WHEN LEVEL=12 THEN NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#m12#,',','')),0) END) AS REFUEL_QY ,#regUsr# AS REG_USR ,SYSDATE AS REGIST_DT ,#updUsr# AS UPD_USR ,SYSDATE AS UPDT_DT FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 12
sqlMap.update: UPDATE CAR_REFUEL_STTUS_F SET REFUEL_QY = (CASE WHEN REFUEL_MT=#refuelMt# || '01' THEN NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#m1#,',','')),0) WHEN REFUEL_MT=#refuelMt# || '02' THEN NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#m2#,',','')),0) WHEN REFUEL_MT=#refuelMt# || '03' THEN NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#m3#,',','')),0) WHEN REFUEL_MT=#refuelMt# || '04' THEN NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#m4#,',','')),0) WHEN REFUEL_MT=#refuelMt# || '05' THEN NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#m5#,',','')),0) WHEN REFUEL_MT=#refuelMt# || '06' THEN NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#m6#,',','')),0) WHEN REFUEL_MT=#refuelMt# || '07' THEN NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#m7#,',','')),0) WHEN REFUEL_MT=#refuelMt# || '08' THEN NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#m8#,',','')),0) WHEN REFUEL_MT=#refuelMt# || '09' THEN NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#m9#,',','')),0) WHEN REFUEL_MT=#refuelMt# || '10' THEN NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#m10#,',','')),0) WHEN REFUEL_MT=#refuelMt# || '11' THEN NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#m11#,',','')),0) WHEN REFUEL_MT=#refuelMt# || '12' THEN NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#m12#,',','')),0) END) ,UPD_USR = #updUsr# ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE CAR_REGIST_NO = #carRegistNo#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM CAR_REFUEL_STTUS_F WHERE REFUEL_MT>= #refuelMt# || '01' AND REFUEL_MT<= #refuelMt# || '12' AND CAR_REGIST_NO = #carRegistNo#
